casebody.data:
IN RE: E.J.V. 392P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Susan Vaughan, for Vaughan, Susan.

Courtney S. Hull, Attorney at Law, For Dare County DSS.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of November 2017 by Petitioner (Grandmother) to Amend Notice of Appeal and Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
